record.name: Send Notification to Assignee when Problem Task has assignee

rule.condition: not (same(assignee.name in $L.file, NULL)) and (not (same(assignee.name in $L.file, assignee.name in $L.file.save)) or same(assignee.name in $L.file.save, NULL))
rule.conditionDesc: ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord != NULL AND ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord != assignee.name in SavedRecord OR assignee.name in SavedRecord = NULL))
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><collection logical="AND" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: PT.Assignee (when ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord != NULL AND ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord != assignee.name in SavedRecord OR assignee.name in SavedRecord = NULL)))

rule.condition: same(assignee.name in $L.file, NULL) and not (same(assignment in $L.file, NULL)) and (same(assignment in $L.file.save, NULL) or not (same(assignment in $L.file, assignment in $L.file.save)))
rule.conditionDesc: ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord = NULL AND assignment in CurrentRecord != NULL AND ( assignment in SavedRecord = NULL OR assignment in CurrentRecord != assignment in SavedRecord))
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignment Group">assignment</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><collection logical="AND" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignment Group">assignment</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignment Group">assignment</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignment Group">assignment</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: PT.Assignment Group (when ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord = NULL AND assignment in CurrentRecord != NULL AND ( assignment in SavedRecord = NULL OR assignment in CurrentRecord != assignment in SavedRecord)))
